attributes.action: release disability living allowance(excluding mobility component) to all expats who had this benefit revoked.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: disability living allowance is now an exportable benefit to other eu countries but for those of us who's dla was revoked when we left the uk prior to 2007 it seems we are still being discriminated against.the exportability advisory team has still not made any decision on the re-instatement of our benefits and this amounts to blatant discrimination of our rights.
